body_html: @mcarilli for context, ATen currently does not have any concept of a "device" beyond CPU vs. CUDA (i.e. the "ordinal" part is missing from ATen's model). I'm working on changing this right now, so you can expect this to be fixed soon
body_text: @mcarilli for context, ATen currently does not have any concept of a "device" beyond CPU vs. CUDA (i.e. the "ordinal" part is missing from ATen's model). I'm working on changing this right now, so you can expect this to be fixed soon
body: @mcarilli for context, ATen currently does not have any concept of a "device" beyond CPU vs. CUDA (i.e. the "ordinal" part is missing from ATen's model). I'm working on changing this right now, so you can expect this to be fixed soon
